title: Give us Star Guardian Invasion with new SG's.
body: C'mon riot, even though the gamemode is shortlived for the event and not extremely profitable, it is still super fun and it's what players want :) You cant just give star guardians season 2 a huge event and then gloss over season 3. Let's hope they actually give us the event.

replies.body: Pve makes less money since you only have 5 people to entice into buying the new content and has costs vs just releasing more overpriced skins.
I think it has already been confirmed that there isn't going to be a SG event because the next patch after star guardians has the worlds event
It'd be nice to have Star Guardian vs. Dark Star as an event.
They are two unrelated universes though.
You sure? The Dark Star sounds an awful lot like an evil version of the First Star.
Yeah, it's pretty clear. Dark Star is part of the Event Horizon universe which also includes Cosmic. Just look it up in the client, they have nothing to do with Star Guardian.
They've already planned out events for the rest of the year, we're not getting a sg event.
